Class ClientNetwork

java.lang.Object

public class ClientNetwork
extends java.lang.Object

An Object that handles the network requirements of a Client.

tryConnectAsClient

public boolean tryConnectAsClient()
Try to connect as a client. Used for multiuser connections.

Since:
1.8

tryConnectAsServer

public void tryConnectAsServer()
Begin the server listener thread. This will accept any new clients and enable them to communicate with anyone else. This is used for multiuser connections.

Since:
1.8
